channel.title: CVE Feed for Shina System Co.,Ltd -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-26637|2024-08-03T20:26:25.557Z -- shina%20system%20co.%2Cltd -- sihas%20firmware
item.description: There is no account authentication and permission check logic in the firmware and existing apps of SiHAS's SGW-300, ACM-300, GCM-300, so unauthorized users can remotely control the device.
